senderName.description: Sender's name. SMS names in the status “Approved” with the validity date not later than the time of sending the request are allowed

tags.description: Message tags (array of strings). Each tag must match the expression `^\w+$` (letters in any case, digits and underscore "_" are allowed).

useLocalTime.description: Flag responsible for the time zone in which the message will be sent: `true` - send in the subscriber's time zone; `false` - send according to MSK. Default is true

localSendTime.description: Lower boundary of the allowable time of message sending (taking into account the `useLocalTime` value). Date in the format '`YYYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss`' in the range from (current time in UTC - 12 hours) to (current time in UTC + 7 days). By default, the message will be sent immediately

localCompletionTime.description: Upper limit of allowable message sending time (taking into account `useLocalTime`) in the range from `localSendTime` to (current time in UTC + 70 days)

ttl.description: The lifetime of the message in seconds. After ttl expires, the message is set to final status. `60 ≤ ttl ≤ 86400`

hours.description: Allowed sending hours (array of numbers). The array can contain integers from 0 to 23, each of which corresponds to an allowed sending hour interval, taking into account `useLocalTime`; the values must be unique

days.description: Allowed sending days (array of numbers). The array can contain integers from 1 (Mon) to 7 (Fri), each of which corresponds to a day of the week allowed for sending; values must be unique

shortUrl.description: Flag responsible for shortening links in the message: `true` - links in the message text will be shortened. Default is `false`

callbackEvents.description: Events on which callbacks will be sent (array of strings). If `callbackUrl` is present and there are no `callbackEvents` in the request, a callback will be sent on the `delivered` event

externalMessageId.description: Internal id of the message in your system. Up to 100 characters
